Welcome to ``aws_organizations`` Documentation
==============================================================================


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``aws_organizations`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install aws_organizations

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade aws_organizations
